original_text: The Israelites heard God's strong words. His message made them very upset. They stopped wearing their jewels, to show that they were sad.
korean_text: 백성이 이 준엄한 말씀을 듣고 슬퍼하여 한 사람도 자기의 몸을 단장하지 아니하니

sentences.original_text: The Israelites heard God's strong words.
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 하나님의 강한 말씀을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: His message made them very upset.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 메시지는 그들을 매우 속상하게 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: to show that they were sad.
